content.rendered:
At Luxe this autumn we are loving all things DAVINES!

To celebrate the start of the season Davines have an amazing gift every time you purchase a essential Shampoo & Conditioner (love smooth, love curl, melu, volu, momo, nou nou) for $61.90 & receive a wild & virtuous scented twin candle set valued at $29.95

OR

Purchase an Oi Shampoo & Oi Conditioner for $72.90 & receive a wild & virtuous scented twin candle set valued at $29.95. This offer will be sure to stimulate your senses. Hurry as only limited stock.

Ammonia free colour.

Davines A NEW Colour is a permanent hair colour that delivers truly extraordinary results without using ammonia.

Have your colour without the itch! Ammonia free colour is all the coverage without the sensitivity!

Ammonia free colour is shiny, vibrant & won’t affect the integrity of your hair whilst still being able to promise 100% grey coverage odourless . As a promotion for our clients who are experiencing A New Colour we would like to offer a Colour VIP (Vibrancy Insurance Pack) for $50 valued at $89.90

Enriched with hydrolised milk proteins, added colour pigment to maximise the brilliant vibrancy, condition & shine of your colour for up to 6 weeks.
